bug_report.summary: The 'x²' and '√' buttons are missing on the keyboard layout in the scientific mode

steps.step: Click on the 'Выбор' button on the menu bar and choose 'Инженерный' mode

bug_report.expected_result: The 'x²' and '√' buttons appear after switching to the 'Инженерный' mode
bug_report.actual_result: The 'x²' and '√' buttons do not appear after switching to the 'Инженерный' mode
